he would find the deathless essence must

Springs from a thousand inexplicable

a classmate accosted me one afternoon on
Grouper Road
hello none to my invisibility at school
has actually placed me there and in

I am burdened myself under his friendly

left heartedly my predicament was not
without a comic aspect you are utterly

I suppose it is up to me to help you
the simple words convey divine promise
to my ears with alacrity I visited my

considered likely to be set by the
instructor these questions are the bait
which will catch many trusting boys in

and you will escape without injury the

bursting with on season erudition I

next few critical days nan too had
coached me in my various subjects but
under press of time had forgotten my
course in Sanskrit fervently I reminded

my new knowledge to the rhythm of
swinging footsteps as I took a shortcut
through the weeds of a corner lot my eye
fell on a few loose printed sheets a
triumphant pound proved them to be a
Sanskrit verse I sought out a pundit for
aid in my stumblin interpretation his
rich voice filled the air with the edge
list honey beauty of the ancient tongue
these exceptional stanzas cannot
possibly be of aid in your Sanskrit test
the scholar dismissed them sculpted Lee
but familiarity with that particular
poem enabled me on the following day to
pass the Sanskrit examination through
the discerning help non too had given I
also attained the minimum grade for
success in all my other subjects father
was pleased that I had kept my word and
concluded my secondary school course my
gratitude sped to the Lord whose sole
guidance I perceived in my visit to
Nantou am I walked by the unhitch will
route of the debris-filled lot playfully
he had given a dual expression to his
time in design for my rescue I came
across a discarded book whose author
denied God precedence in the examination
Hall I could not restrain a chuckle at
my own silent comment it would only add
to this fellow's confusion if I were to
tell him the divine mediation among the
cadavers is a shortcut to any high
school diploma
in my new dignity I was now openly
planning to leave home together with
young friend Jitendra Mazumdar I decided
to join a Mahon delle Hermitage in
Banaras and receive its spiritual
discipline a desolation fell over me one
morning at the thought of separation
from my family since mother's death my
affection had grown especially tender
for my two younger brothers sananda and
Vishnu I rushed my retreat the little
Attic which had witnessed so many scenes
in my turbulence Adana
after a two-hour flood of tears I felt
singularly transformed as by some
alchemical cleanser all attachment
disappeared my resolution to seek God is
the friend of friends set like granite
within me I quickly completed my travel
preparations I make one last plea father
was distressed as I stood before him for
final blessing do not forsake me in your
grieving brothers and sisters revered
father how can I tell you my love for
you but even greater still is my love
for the Heavenly Father who has given me
the gift of a perfect father on earth
let me go that I someday return with the
more divine understanding with reluctant
parental consent I set out to join
Jitendra already in Banaras at the
hermitage on my arrival the young head
swami day yonder greeted me cordially
tall and thin of thoughtful mean he
impressed me favourably his fair face
had a Buddha light composure I was
pleased at my new home possessed an
attic where I managed to spend the dawn
in morning hours the ashram members
knowing little of meditation practice
thought I should employ my whole time
and organizational duties they gave me
praise for my afternoon work in their
office don't try to catch God so soon
this ridicule from a fellow resident

is required of me Here I am seeking
direct perception of God without him I
cannot be sad
aside with affiliation or creed or
performance of good work
the orange robed ecclesiastic gave me an

he admonished a few nearby disciples
don't bother Mukunda he will learn our
ways i pletely cancel my doubt the
students left the room not overly bent
with their chastisement diana had
further words for me Mukunda i see a
father is regularly sending you money
please return it to him you require none
here a second injunction for your
discipline concerns food even when you
feel hunger don't mention it
whether famish meant in my eyes I knew
not that I was hungry I knew only too

breakfast at nine o'clock the three hour

one day I undertook a 24-hour fast with

midday the under juice train is late
we're not going to eat until he arrives

delicacies were in readiness an

nothing else offering what else could be

divine attention was elsewhere
however the plotting clock covered the

one of unfeigned joy died and adji will

my young stomach knew to deprivation

the next Banaras death from starvation
is do it once in this Hermitage I

hours intense absorption yet permitted

filled with the heterogeneous vibrations

tonight at home I have neglected my
dinner what's the hurry
tomorrow I will make it a point to have
a proper meal he laughed merrily shame
spreads within me like a suffocation but
the past day of my torture was not

your instruction suppose I never asked
for food and nobody gives many I should
starve to death die then this alarming
council split the heir died if you must
makanda never admit that you live by the

will certainly see that his devotee is
sustained do not imagine that rice

with draws your life breath they are his

stomach
use the sword of your discrimination
Mukunda cut through the change of agency
and perceive the single cause I found
his incisive words enter in some deep
meryl gan was an age-old illusion by
which bodily imperatives out with the

cities in my later life of ceaseless
travel
did occasion arise to prove the surface
ability of this lesson in a Banaras
hermitage the sole treasure which is
accompanied me from Calcutta was a sadhu
silver amulet bequeathed to me by mother

one morning I opened the lock box the
sealed covering on touch lo the amulet
was gone
mournfully I tore open its envelope and

in accordance with the sod whose
prediction in the ether once he had

resolved to pray until answers was
vouchsafed merciful mother of the

the passing hours found my sobbing

everywhere in know where this supernal

habu was calling me from the downstairs

now I wet my tear swollen face and

passing an inconspicuous land
I turned my head and surveyed the narrow
length a christ-like man in an ochre
robe of swami stood motionless at the
end of the road instantly an ancient Li
familiar eg seen my gaze fed hungrily
for a thrice then doubt assailed me you
are confusing this wandering monk with

further laborious Li I turned around my

of amazement and now burst in the

my tumultuous emotions prevented any

Halcyon eyes inly on head with pointed

my hand in
is my guru led me to his temporary

sir I come for wisdom and God contact
those are your treasure troves I'm after

tenderness
I give you my unconditional love
precious words a quarter century laps
before I had another Oracle ur proof of

you give me the same unconditional love
he gazed at me with childlike tries I
will love you eternally guru Dayla
ordinary love is selfish darkly rooted

without change the flux of the human

transfixing touch of pure love
he added humbly if ever you find me

please promise to put my head on your

then in the gathering darkness and

unobtrusively wolf in his conversation
an intimate knowledge of my nature I was

it has served its purpose like a divine

the living reality of your presence
master is joy beyond any symbol it is

now seem superfluous by his natural and
pathetic manner I understood that he

my chief Hermitage is ceramic pour on

kasi Banaras hollowed by memories of

my interest I won't accept you as a

training I remain obstinately silent
my guru easily penetrated my difficulty
do you think your relatives will laugh

the controversial tension as I made my
way into the midnight darkness I

ended on an harmonious note the dual

malleable to the transforming fingers of

pandemonium broke out over my hapless
head Mukunda is a parasite accepting

please convey my respectful regrets
